storyName: Let Us Ring a Ding Ding
storyInfo: 'Flametail' and 'Ashlock' want to recruit capable hands for the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub, and the 'Wild Mane' Knight, who's been thrown behind bars, is a fine choice. After Wild Mane carefully observes Pinus Sylvestris, she realizes they possess ideals entirely unlike the other Knightclubs...

attributes.content: A breakout from the underground arena, two stages advanced in the preliminaries... a challenger with outstanding skill, Infected knight, 'Wild Mane' Iwona Krukowska...
attributes.name: Voice on the Television

attributes.content: 'Wild Mane?'
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What is it, Sona?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: ...however, caused an improper altercation with other knights in the rest quarters, and was violent in the confrontation...
attributes.name: Voice on the Television

attributes.content: ...may face a 'suspension'...
attributes.name: Voice on the Television

attributes.content: Here it goes again. Another report on the dark side of Infected knights.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: 'Improper altercation.' Hah, do you have to imagine? It can't have been anything but losers hooting at the winner.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: When it's Infected knights competing, they'll say shit as bad they want to say.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You saw that clip of the match just now, Ashley. This Kuranta's... got some skills.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Her style's pretty distinct from those flower-show nobles, yeah, but she's still a ways off from the top tiers.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Mmm...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You wanna recruit her?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: I've heard about her before... some of the knightclub knows her.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What are we still looking for? 'The team leader needs real skill and overpowering force.' Your words, Ashley.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I wanna test our luck. Every independent knight is getting scouted by knightclub agents. If we invite her as an Infected knightclub, that oughta catch her interest.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I've got a feeling she's the one we're looking for.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Are you interested in her skill, or do you think she shares our agenda?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: That's what'cha find out in your a little chat.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Firstly, you need a chance to meet and talk at all. You heard it on the news. The K.G.C.C. is considering handing her a 'suspension'. That's not something you settle with a flick of the wrist.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: The prelims just started, she's an Infected, and she's green for an independent knight. No one's going to be able to help her.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: And what if we actually could, this time?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You need to think this through properly, Sona. It's a risky gamble. If she's already firm on riding this down to the end, we're going to be rivals.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: But... if you need to talk to her, it's going to be worth all our strength trying. Where Pinus Sylvestris is right now, every new ally is crucial.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: We oughta try and see. If we can get our point across... then things being what they are, I'm pretty sure she'll want to do a little something for the Infected.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Some days later...
Tch. Nobody in the K.G.C.C. wants to hear the facts. If you don't want a fair ruling in the first place, why get all sanctimonious blabbing at me?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hff... damn, it hurts. Police batons got way more oomph than all that third-rate noble crap. Way I see it, they might as well put those guards up to fight a round or two. Lords in the audiences would love to see that...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: She's out, she's out!
Huh?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Wild Mane Knight, does leaving the General Chamber of Commerce mean the government's already made their ruling?
attributes.name: News Reporter

attributes.content: What are your thoughts on the dispute you had with the knights in the lounge? Was it an act of provocation?
attributes.name: News Reporter

attributes.content: Is it fair to the other knights to have you, an Infected knight, using the same facilities?
attributes.name: News Reporter

attributes.content: Get out of my face! All of you!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You need to answer our questions, Wild Mane Knight! Also, just what pretext did you use for the General Chamber of Commerce to let you slip out...
attributes.name: News Reporter

attributes.content: Aaarrrrghhh, who the hell d'you think you are?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Oh, here she is.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Hah, hah... huh?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Were you... waiting for me?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I saw that scene at the entrance coming a mile away. You only had a few choices, and one of them was here. Unless... you wanted to bust your way out.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Looks like you've got it now though. The further you are from the camera, the better. Let me introduce myself...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: No need, I know you. Big cannon-toter, and there's the other one with the sword. You two Zalaks are partners, and you're good enough in a fight.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I'll take that as a compliment.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ashlock, right? Are you here to pick a fight? Or just make fun of me?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: We knew you were walking into a mess. So we came to offer help, in case you need.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ohh. Such as?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Take those reporters, not to mention some of the agents around with ulterior motives. We can help you turn them all down.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Who are you guys?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I'll take that one.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: If you already know us and what we do, then this'll go a lot easier.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We keep a keen eye on the Infected knights. So when we saw on TV the kind of trouble you were getting into, we came up with a little plan...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Could you just come out and say it already? Complicated talk is just gonna hurt my head. What do you want out of me?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: To put it straight, we're in charge of the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub. If you believe in the same things we do, then I want you to join us.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Pinus Sylvestris? Never heard of it.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: We're a new knightclub, mostly Infected knights...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...Infected?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You think you'll make more money with a club full of Infected knights barely clinging to life? Ha, must be paradise and a half in your head.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: No! We're not like the clubs who use Infected as a moneymaking sideshow. We're all about mutual aid between Infected.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: And how's that gonna work?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The first part... we'll improve the treatment of Infected knights in the Major. That's the idea.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We all know how the Infected in the other clubs end up. All the money they promise is a scam, and their minimum bet is your life.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ha. I bet all the Infected who fought their way through the arena want to ask: when's a single day go by without betting your life?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: When those noble knight families lose, at least they've still got a home to trot back to with their tails between their legs...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Infected? If you want status, you head into that nightmare of an underground arena with everyone else and lose your mind scrambling for a knight title.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: And just suppose you live through it. How long's your career, how far do you go? That's all for the moneybags to decide. They just wanna see you bleed.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Beat you half to death? Not enough for 'em. What those lunatic scumbags want to see in their heart of hearts is—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Wild Mane, let's not.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ugh. I know. Just venting.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: No point talking about all this, anyway. What I need is someplace I can fix my weapon. I can do better than this beat-up hunk of junk shelled lance.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Uh, we may not have a real certified weapon specialist yet, but we could always hire a professional...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: In other words, if I join, I get some basic benefits?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Right, salary... we can just about pay you like another knightclub. But, you know, our aim's always been...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Then I'm joining.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I said, I'm joining. I don't know what your Infected knightclub's gonna be like, but it's gotta beat any other choice.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I've seen the eyes of the uninfected knights staring at us and I'm through with it. I'm not associating with any of those chuckleheads.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Before I became a knight, survival was top priority, and everything was for getting fed. Ever since becoming a knight... that hasn't changed much.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I don't wanna put up with all that just to eat. If your thing can keep my stomach from running empty, and there's no old noble knightheads to make me throw up, then I'm with you for now.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: In that case, you want to get paid how much...?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Holds out three fingers)
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Three?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Money for three days' food, and the funds to fix my weapon. I'm taking that match the day after tomorrow, and when I get that prize money, I'll pay you back, and then I'm officially splitting the rest with you.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The K.G.C.C. wanted bail before they'd let me out. Their stupid fine was so precise, it was my bank balance straight up—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: If anyone could get the number, it'd be them.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So, right now, I'm penniless, and I'm starving. No objections there?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: None at all. I can give you an advance here, and when you're done with that pressing stuff, come see us at the knightclub.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Now we're talking. Tell me the address. I'm gonna need your base tomorrow so I can practice how I'm gonna bust clean through the armor of that jackass who had words for me—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Alright, I'll spar with you.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Deal, see you there. If you renege on me, I'm coming to find you and you'd better believe I'll settle the score!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: What's up, Ashley? You've been eyeing me this whole time.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You seriously... just gave her cash, had her join, and let her go? My guess is she doesn't even get why the K.G.C.C. let her walk out of that building in the first place.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Haha, fixing your weapon's gotta be number one when you're a battle maniac! She's been slammed up for days, and there's no way she's talking serious business first thing.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: And besides, we've got no time to explain things to her right now, we just came by with a few words. We've got other stuff going on.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So you're saying you don't think there's a way to wrap this up quick, and you'll be in a better place to chat her up tomorrow?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: All we can do is stay on guard. It depends on if they leave the neighborhood Infected alone tonight...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Wishful thinking.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: I know. That's exactly why this is something we have to do right now. I'll sort out the stuff with Wild Mane later, trust me.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Fine, whatever. I mean, your instinct wasn't wrong. Wild Mane sure is interesting.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Oh? Where's this coming from?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The way she sees things... is kind of like how I used to. She might be more blunt... but she's got none of that excess baggage.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Pffhaha. That's just what I need, you two finding common ground.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The next day...
An abandoned office building entrance
This is the place, right? This dump... is this seriously a knightclub?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Whatever, just in case. I might as well go in and ask...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hey, are the Flametail or Ashlock Knights in here—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Looking for the leader?
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm here to check in.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I'm surprised someone actually came knocking... Unfortunately, they just left on business... Why are you carrying luggage?
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: I'm surprised myself. What's got this place so strapped for cash? You don't even have a sofa?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Award money's ample for knights, true... but Sona and her crew use most of it to settle Infected.
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: Oh, I see. Thing is, I just got kicked out by my landlord, so I've only got my knightclub for shelter.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Put your luggage down for now, and we can work out what to do once the leader's back.
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: Speaking of, are they this busy all the time? Where do they drill?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: There's a lot of work-related communication that needs handling.
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: Audits against Knightclubs for Infected knights are getting stricter. The Flametail and Ashlock Knights are constantly talking with the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi and the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: *yawn* That's bureaucrats for you, all image. I thought at least there'd be proper eats for my initiation ceremony. Ashlock sure seemed like she could handle her drink.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Speaking of Ashlock, where's she put her cannon? I've been wanting to check it out. With a 'baaang' like that, and that truckload of destructive power...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Er, her weapon's... probably at home.
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: You're duping me.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Huh? Nuh-uh...
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: I can tell. You're hiding something from me.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: What, scared to tell me where Flametail and Ashlock are right now? They're up to something outside of the Major for sure. Sensed as much during our conversation last night.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The leader did warn me someone might be coming, but the rest isn't... for me to tell you.
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: If she doesn't want you telling me, why wouldn't they wait until I came before they left?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: They...
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: Something's definitely pressing on 'em, and that's what's keeping 'em away from here. It can't be anything good.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Ha, I was right!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I knew it. It couldn't have been that simple when they came looking for me. You're up to some risky business, aren't you?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: If Flametail and Ashlock made the right call... then they—no, we—want you to lend us your power.
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: Oh, and there's the other thing... they put up some extra money to rescue you.
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: ...Can you repeat that?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: They wouldn't have wanted you to know. Not every member agrees with how our leader's going about things. She saw the news report about you, and decided to try getting you out.
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: Since the deal even got made, there must have been conditions attached...
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: Stop. I don't wanna owe 'em favors. If that's really how it's going down, I'm mad as hell, because I've got some responsibility for this too.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Fess up. Where'd they go?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: They went to a neighborhood with an Infected settlement, to scatter them before they're taken away.
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: Wait, Wild Mane!
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: What now?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Flametail and Ashlock, they're both exceptionally kind, honest knights. I'm certain they want to recruit you because they know you're like us...
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: They're not just Infected knights, they're people who want to change the lot of the Infected in Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: And what does that mean?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: When you... see their efforts, you'll understand.
attributes.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Member

attributes.content: Over there—over there—
Don't worry, just get behind me...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Come out, Infected! You can't run!
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: *whimper*... I'm sorry... I... I'm not bad... don't take me...
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: Calm down, I'll keep them away. Are you all hidden, kid?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Yeah... Miss, I—I'm scared... where's... mom and dad...
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: I'll protect you, just like your mom and dad did. Trust me, okay? Once I call for you to come out, we'll find somewhere new to live, together.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Miss... I want to go home...
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: Keep quiet a sec.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Mmm...
attributes.name: Infected Child

attributes.content: Right then.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Phew. C'mere—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Yo.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Huh?! You—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...Wild Mane?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Found you this fast and all I had was a wisp of a clue, and I got here quicker than that gray Zalak did. No slouch, am I?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You really did track us down.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You're protecting this kid? He's Infected?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What, you're gonna hide a kid here? That's a whole five hunters. If just one of 'em succeeds, then he's lost before you even try to get him back.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: We... we're too short-handed right now. This is the most we can do.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Mm-hm. So, this is what you're really up to?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Yeah. That's about the size of it.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You're not just in for Infected knights. You guys are helping out more Infected besides, aren't you?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: That's the deal.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ha... and that's why you only recruit Infected knights. Because only the Infected would sympathize with Infected.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Everyone keeps the same secret, has the same wish, even though it seems... totally head-on with those competition knights, yeah?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Yeah. Wild Mane, I don't have time to give you the whole story right now, so if you want out...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Why? I think this is majorly cool.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Yeah, no time. But before anything else, Flametail, I want you to seriously, truly invite me one more time.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You mean... you've decided to do this with us?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ha. What, am I not just like you?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Alright... I get it.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Wild Mane, are you willing to become a member of the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub, to aid and be aided as an Infected knight, and to give your all, as we all do, for the sake of the Infected?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Wild Mane? Sorry, I messed that up, didn't I. I never feel like that speech quite works for me...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Call me Iwona.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I'm the Wild Mane Knight, Iwona Krukowska.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Ha. Alright, you're calling me Sona then.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Sure, Sona. I, Iwona, as a new inductee to the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub, will serve as a knight to seize glory, and to achieve our ideals.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: And my ideals—Sona, if Pinus Sylvestris can change the lot of the Infected, and protect the people... then together with you, I'm going for broke.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Going for broke... yeah, that's exactly the right choice of words here.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But it's not time to stake our lives just yet. We can't leave this kid alone. You're the leader, and it'll be too risky if anyone sees you in an alley doing this stuff.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Just get the kid out of here for now, and I'll handle things here.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Watch close, see what I'm really capable of—wait, no, you oughta go first. Watch another time, then!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Get out of here! By the time you've got the kid dropped off safe, I'll probably be on my way back to find you.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Got it. Don't make this a scene though. Settle it slick, and we'll be waiting for you at the real Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub camp!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: No sweat.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Phew... kept'cha waiting, huh, Ashley...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Good going, Sona. All done?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: For the time being. Say, where's Iwona... uh, Wild Mane?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Seems she went off reminiscing with Jamie...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Here you were, I got back forever ago. Wanted to ask Jamie for a drink, but there's no good booze anywhere around here.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: How's this, then. You get the prize money, and I'll treat you to a round.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ha, done.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I'll join too then.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Nah.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: 'Scuse me? Why won'tcha let me in on this?! What, you guys already have stuff to talk behind my back?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Do you even have time? There's a mountain of paperwork from the Knights Association...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Agh... don't remind me.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We'll just be belly-aching the whole time, and you hate that stuff. Besides, you're not that good with liquor, and you don't like staying at bars all night.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ugh... no lie. If that's what you're planning, you're your own.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Right, Iwona, if you're not busy, there's a few things I need to tell you about, regarding a few projects Pinus Sylvestris has going...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Those, yeah? Greynuty just told me about 'em.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Rescuing Infected, and Infected knights, and using prize money to help more Infected get legal identities...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Huh, you're all wised up already... so, what'cha think?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: All the prize money I earn can go to you guys. I was training to become a campaign knight. Never thought about doing this to earn big bucks. If it wasn't for... ugh.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Whatever. But in terms of the, uh, more detailed plans, I didn't actually get any of it.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Greynuty said, what Pinus Sylvestris is gonna do for the Infected, how we should do it... you do all that planning.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: So I get it now. You can think this stuff through and put it into practice. That's mad mighty.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Mmm—it's not all that mighty, heh...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I've been thinking about doing something for the Infected forever... just like the Blood Knight! He does some good, fine stuff.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The Blood Knight reformed the Major's regulations, but us... Pinus Sylvestris looks to bring together a big group, form an even greater bloc, and do even more for the Infected.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Then I'm definitely part of it.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: So it's settled, I'll follow you all the way. I believe you're what's right, and whatever bigger challenges come, I'll be there to help you deal with 'em.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But, if you can help me sort out a few problems of my own first, I'll worship you all the more.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Heheh. If it'll win more trust, of course I'm happy to do it. What'cha need helping with?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Uh... what's this?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: My pet.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Peeehhh... pet?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: A pet, huh... that's... it's pretty cute! Iwona, how'd you come across it?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ha, just saw it in a dump by the roadside, felt like I could get some use. They say you know a reliable engineer or some sort?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Engineer? I don't know what kind you're talking about...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Oh, I think there are a few in the neighborhood who know their machine stuff.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Just a bit ago you were having hell finding a weapons repair guy, but now you've got people who understand these machines? What's the deal?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Haha... well, he might take an interest in your weapon too. Should I take you?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Whatever, I'll take it over myself. You and Greynuty have other stuff to talk about, so go get chattering. Where's that engineer live?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: ...I see now. This fine outer hull and internal design...
attributes.name: Infected Knight-Engineer

attributes.content: How is it? Good stuff, right? This weapon's been with me for years now.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But something I don't get... if you really are that strong, why was your major lance's hull so broken when you were coming out of the K.G.C.C.?
attributes.name: Infected Knight-Engineer

attributes.content: You wanna know?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: So long as you don't blow up the story too big, I'll hear you out. I wanna know how you use it, principally.
attributes.name: Infected Knight-Engineer

attributes.content: Ha. Where should I start, then—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Back when I was still readying to be a campaign knight, this lance was drawn up for the real battlefield, designed to open the way for the forces behind.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: My major lance takes a tremendous amount of force and impact, multiple times over.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: After the way's opened up, I'd switch over to a minor lance.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But, ever since I started in the arena, I've never let this big thing break.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: In other words... you haven't used your full strength, because you don't actually want to take anyone's life?
attributes.name: Infected Knight-Engineer

attributes.content: In those grimy underground arenas...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Whether it's orders blaring at top volume or captions on the screen, it's all pushing me to do vicious work on someone, and they don't call it a win until they see every other Infected on the ground...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I never once seriously injured 'em before.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But when I finally clawed my way to being a competition knight, I heard what those old nobleheads were saying about me in the lounge...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Well, I hadn't treaded the ground in a long, long time. Took out my minor lance, aimed it right at the armor over those acid-spitters' hearts—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You understand? I was really, actually hoping to run them straight through.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Cheers to that. Would've been feel-good!
attributes.name: Infected Knight-Engineer

attributes.content: Feel-good nothing. Just give my pet a look already!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Oh, right...
attributes.name: Infected Knight-Engineer

attributes.content: Examination's done. This is an old Raythean model... and it shouldn't be too complicated to reboot it.
attributes.name: Infected Knight-Engineer

attributes.content: But it's got fairly limited capability. It probably won't understand your commands too well.
attributes.name: Infected Knight-Engineer

attributes.content: I'm good as long as it knows its own name.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Name? What will you name it?
attributes.name: Infected Knight-Engineer

attributes.content: I decided a long time ago—I'm calling it Justice Knight. Here's hoping it's a little doer of a pet.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Its original function was cover fire, it seems.
attributes.name: Infected Knight-Engineer

attributes.content: Well, isn't that peachy? It'll clean up nobodies for me. More boring than I'd like for a function, though. Can you make it more useful?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Depends whether there's any other compatible modules it can make use of...
attributes.name: Infected Knight-Engineer

attributes.content: You need to find other parts to fit? Leave it for later, then. Let's see if we can get to light up first?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Taking a look now...
attributes.name: Infected Knight-Engineer

attributes.content: (Sound of machine activating)
Ooh, there it goes.
attributes.name: Iwona
